ygData.subject: Re: Soul Fire
ygData.msgSnippet: hehe...ok kiting is what druids  can do.....basically taking on an npc that s a few levels above you, yellow to red, and snaring them,
ygData.messageBody:
hehe...ok kiting is what druids <and bards sometimes> can do.....basically
taking on an npc that's a few levels above you, yellow to red, and snaring
them, swarming them, and then running and blasting with sow on........i think
it's quite interesting.....useful too if you have the mana to be able to take
them down.....i haven't begun to master this yet, but still working on
it......would love to be able to solo a yellow kill without getting
killed...need more mana for that tho......

curtis bennett wrote:

> From: "curtis bennett" <die_kluge@...>
>
> God, playing this game is like learning a new language.
> What is kiting?
>
> >From: "Heather M. Daley" <blushn@...>
> >
> >I found it quite amusing last night while i was in Rathe Mts. we were
> >hunting Hill giants and there was a Druid who was a blue con to me, so he
> >was under lvl 35 and he was kiting hill giants that were yellow to me so
> >chances are it was red to him. amazing what kiting can do
>
